00011 function checkBarcode($barcode) {
00015   $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00016   if ($result[1] != 'Error: Invalid length') {
00017     if (strlen($barcode) == 12) {
00018       return 'upca';
00019     }
00020     else if (strlen($barcode) == 13) {
00021       return 'ean13';
00022     }
00023     else {
00024       return FALSE;
00025     }
00026   }
00027   else {
00028     return FALSE;
00029   }
00030 }

00038 function getBarcodeInfo($barcode) {
00042   $output = '';
00043   $output .= '<div id="upc">';
00044   $output .= '<img src="upcimg.php?upc=' . $barcode . '" />';
00045   $output .= '</div>';
00046 
00050   $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00051   /*if ($debug) */var_dump($result);
00052   if ($result[1]['found']) {
00053     extract($result[1], EXTR_PREFIX_ALL, 'barcode');
00054     $output .= <<<_HTML
00055     <div id="info">
00056       <table align="center">
00057         <tr>
00058           <td class="title">Country</td>
00059           <td>$barcode_issuerCountry</td>
00060         </tr>
00061         <tr>
00062           <td class="title">Description</td>
00063           <td>$barcode_description</td>
00064         </tr>
00065         <tr>
00066           <td class="title">Size</td>
00067           <td>$barcode_size</td>
00068         </tr>
00069       </table>
00070       <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/editform.asp?upc=$barcode">Modify this entry</a>
00071       <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/deleteform.asp?upc=$barcode">Delete this entry</a>
00072     </div>
00073 _HTML;
00074   }
00075   else {
00076     $output .= 'Product Not Found!<br />';
00077     $output .= '<a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/addform.asp?upc=' . $barcode . '">Add this item to the database</a>';
00078   }
00079 
00080   return $output;
00081 }
